questions.text: Did Leo permanently leave his AA meeting?
questions.explanation:
No.

	The other men in the AA meeting wanted Leo to leave, but Hoynes said, "Guys, my meeting. Leo stays."

questions.text: What subject did Josh say his favorite teacher taught?
questions.correct: AP American History and Communication Law
questions.explanation:
AP American History and Communication Law.

	Donna told Josh about her favorite teacher, Mrs. Morello, retiring which prompted Josh to tell her about his favorite teacher. Donna wanted Josh to give Mrs. Morello a Presidential proclamation because she was 'one of those teachers' and she was retiring. They couldn't give Mrs. Morello a proclamation, but the President turned himself into the 'magic man' and let Donna talk to Mrs. Morello from the Oval Office.

questions.text: What game did Toby and Sam go to?
questions.explanation:
Hockey.

	They went to see the Washington Capitals play.

questions.text: Who did Josh send to talk to Hoynes about the Internet Education bill?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	When Josh told Sam that he was going to see Hoynes, Sam said, "What's he going to say?" Josh told him Hoynes would say, "Josh Lyman, you look a lot like Sam Seaborn." Sam thought Josh sent him to see Hoynes because Josh was talking with others about electing a new Vice President with better electoral math.

questions.text: President Bartlet did Charlie's taxes for him.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Charlie already knew he was getting money back, but when the President finished it turned out Charlie owed money. The President told him to save money on stamps he could just hand the money over to the President. Charlie was going to use the money to buy a James Bond DVD and DVD player so the President told him he was going to have two DVDs and a DVD player delivered to his house because of Charlie's charitable donations on a single income.

questions.text: In what state did the tractor-trailer truck crash that was carrying uranium rods?
questions.explanation:
Idaho & ID.

	The truck was stolen from Glen Ferry two weeks before the crash in an Idaho tunnel.

No tie.

	The President wanted to know why everyone one else brought comfortable clothes to change into after hours, except Leo. Leo told him he was wearing comfortable clothing because he wasn't wearing a tie.

questions.text: What man did Josh compare Vice President Hoynes to?
questions.explanation:
Aaron Burr.

	Josh told everyone, "He's be the craziest Vice President since Aaron Burr and Burr shot a guy." Josh is referring to the duel between Aaron Burr and Alexander Hamilton which resulted in Hamilton's death.

questions.text: Did Leo tell the President that Vice President Hoynes was an alcoholic?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Vice President Hoynes told the President and the President asked, "Is there anybody left that's not?" President Bartlet wrote on a piece of paper the reason he wanted Hoynes as his Vice President was because he could die.

questions.text: The three choices to take over as Vice President were Fitzwallace, Leo, and _________.
questions.explanation:
Ulysses S. Grant

	CJ made the comment that Ulysses S. Grant worked in any situation.
